data.message:
How can I submit my media/entertainment fanpage for a Blue verification badge? We are a group of journalist and we'd like to receive that badge like the Nemzeti Sport (NSO)

Please let me know so I can submit the documents to you. I already tried to get access to Mentions but it's for public figures.

Regards,
Janos K

replies.message: Hey there, János. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1UfjIUQ. -Jordan
Facebook Hey Jordan .. "Page not found. Please reply back to my private message!"
